scripts.copy-vendor: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),path=require('path'); const src=path.join(__dirname,'node_modules','html5-qrcode','minified','html5-qrcode.min.js'); const dstDir=path.join(__dirname,'public','vendor'); const dst=path.join(dstDir,'html5-qrcode.min.js'); fs.mkdirSync(dstDir,{recursive:true}); if (!fs.existsSync(src)) { console.error('Source html5-qrcode not found at', src); process.exit(0);} fs.copyFileSync(src,dst); console.log('Copied html5-qrcode to', dst);"
